TopicTitle: EVA- Camera shifting around as I press movement keys

Articles.Content:
Okay, I think I've got it all figured out.

The problem is that I've had my Camera set to AUTO. When I tried turning AUTO off and switching to another camera mode, the problem disappeared. But with AUTO on, random WASD input in EVA pack mode seemed to trigger a shift in camera type. So whenever I go on EVA, I'll have to remember to turn off AUTO camera.

I'll try removing all my mods and seeing if this can be reproduced in a vanilla install, in which case it'll be reported as a bug.

Edited October 28, 2014 by Brixmon
'Fix' found
